body:
Rapha?l has just opened the 2008 Radiance Workshop for registration.
The URL is:

http://home.hefr.ch/compag/rw2008/

We still have room for one or two additional presentations, if
someone cares to submit an abstract.  Tentative titles are posted for
speakers, with more details to follow.

Hope you can make it!

-Greg
subject: [Radiance-general] Workshop registration is open
